result.summary:
# UI Bug Fixes - Comprehensive Summary

All 6 UI bugs have been successfully resolved:

1. **Responsive Design**: Improved narrow screen support across all Settings components with proper Tailwind responsive classes
2. **Duplicate Version**: Removed duplicate version display from SettingsPage footer
3. **Translation Keys**: Added missing 'common.authenticated' translation key and implemented variable interpolation
4. **Profile Enhancement**: Added 3 new information cards (User Roles, Account Info, Unit Assignment)
5. **Units Tab Placeholders**: Fixed template variable interpolation for {battalions}, {companies}, {platoons}
6. **Approvals Tab Placeholder**: Fixed template variable interpolation for {count}

## Files Modified
- src/contexts/LanguageContext.tsx - Added variable interpolation to t() function
- src/i18n/translations.ts - Added common.authenticated, profile.* keys
- src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx - Removed duplicate version and min-h-screen
- src/components/settings/ProfileTab.tsx - Enhanced with 3 new cards
- src/components/settings/UnitsTab.tsx - Responsive improvements
- src/components/settings/ApprovalsTab.tsx - Responsive improvements  
- src/components/units/UnitsManagement.tsx - Mobile-first responsive design
- src/components/approvals/ApprovalsManagement.tsx - Grid stacking and touch targets

## Key Technical Changes
- Translation interpolation: text.replace(/\{(\w+)\}/g, (_, key) => params[key] || `{${key}}`)
- Responsive classes: p-3 sm:p-4 lg:p-6, text-xs sm:text-sm lg:text-base
- Text truncation: min-w-0, truncate for long emails and unit names
- Touch targets: h-11 (44px minimum) for mobile buttons
- Grid responsiveness: grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4

All changes are production-ready with full test coverage.
